message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IOT, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SE 

The paper discusses security and privacy concerns in smart home networks, which are a subset of the Internet-of-Things (IoT) paradigm. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the spatial and temporal properties of device-to-device and owner-to-cloud interactions, which falls under the category of cs.IOT (Internet of Things). Additionally, the paper discusses ways to adapt existing security solutions, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper discusses privacy concerns, which falls under the category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
